entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Matane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning near noon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
